mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE email = #{email} AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE phone = #{phone} AND deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT sp.perm_code FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.user_id = sur.user_id JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.role_id JOIN sys_role_permission srp ON sr.role_id = srp.role_id JOIN sys_permission sp ON srp.permission_id = sp.permission_id WHERE su.user_id = #{userId} AND su.status = 1 AND su.deleted = 0 AND sr.status = 1 AND sr.deleted = 0 AND sp.status = 1 AND sp.deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT sr.role_code FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.user_id = sur.user_id JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.role_id WHERE su.user_id = #{userId} AND su.status = 1 AND su.deleted = 0 AND sr.status = 1 AND sr.deleted = 0
